title: The Penetrating eye
creator_credit: Eli Lilly and Company and Wexler Film Productions
brief_description: Demonstrates the functioning of a scanning electron microscope and shows how an electron beam, instead of light waves, is used to produce revealing images of microscopically sized specimens. Scanning electron microscope photographs of biological specimens are show and interpreted as to the new information and technique.
